page.title: 07RIVERSIDE FARM, COCKLAKE
page.content: { {TYPE OF FARM }DAIRY AND BEEF {OCCUPANTS}MR AND MRS WILKINSON {ANIMALS}50 FRIESIAN COWS, 2 SADDLEBACK PIGS {PRODUCE }800 LITRES MILK PER DAY {WORKERS}2 FULL TIME, 1 PART TIME AND CONTRACTORS FOR HEDGING AND ROTOVATING {BUILDINGS}2 CUBICLE BUILDINGS, 3 LOOSE BOXES, 3 HAYSHEDS, 2 RENTED SILAGE PITS NEARBY, DAIRY AND MILKING PARLOUR {MACHINERY}1 DAVID BROWN TRACTOR, 1 INTERNATIONAL TRACTOR, MOWER ,HAY TURNER, FERTILIZER, SPINNER, MUCK SPREADER ,TRAILER, MILKING MACHINERY FORAGE WAGON ,GENERATOR {BUYING AND SELLING}BOUGHT 3 HEIFERS AND 2 PIGS, SOLD 8 BARREN COWS AND 42 CALVES,MILK {PESTS}FLIES, FLUKE WORMS,LEATHER JACKETS CAUSE HUSK,WEEDS
